summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from April 1, 2016, to April 30, 2016. It details the beginning and ending balances, deposits, checks paid, and service charges, along with instructions for reporting errors in the account statement.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $812,923.87 on April 1, 2016.
The ending balance as of April 30, 2016, was $61,227.82.
A total of $100,000.00 was credited to the account on April 5, 2016.
Multiple checks were paid during the month, totaling $32,303.95.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in the account statement.
